fields.name: Whispers in the Dark:
fields.value: Astrally attack a player who you've established a Hello Neighbor chat with in the past. This attack is delayed by 3 nights if you didn’t place top 14, 2 nights if you didn’t place top 6, and 1 night if you didn’t place top 3. If you and your target's TWOW response have 3 matching words there is no delay to killing them.

fields.name: Last Echoes (Locked, Passive):
fields.value: Unlocked after killing a player. Your TWOW response must contain one word longer than 5 letters that your last victim said during any day in daychat, if possible.

fields.name: Tension Rises (Charge 200%, Passive):
fields.value: Once you charge this ability, the town is informed that the Slasher is present. Whispers in the Dark can target any player, not just ones you've established Hello Neighbor chats with. Whispers in the Dark also rampages and has no delay. Your attack power becomes 2.0x.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see 3 or fewer players, including yourself, alive. If any other Lone Wolves are alive, the game does not end until they are dead.
